snippet: Gov. Pat Quinn proposed a compromise to solve Illinois’ nearly $100 billion pension crisis, but it was unclear whether the  Democratic House speaker would agree to the plan.
abstract: Gov Pat Quinn proposes compromise to solve Illinois' nearly $100 billion pension crisis; it is unclear whether state's powerful Democratic House speaker Michael Madigan will agree to plan.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Pat Quinn proposed a compromise to solve Illinois’ nearly $100 billion pension crisis, but it was unclear whether the  Democratic House speaker would agree to the plan.

headline.main: Illinois: Governor Offers a Pension Compromise
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Governor Offers a Pension Compromise
